content.description:
I'm coming from an “old-school” programming background, I started with Sinclair Basic on my ZX-Spectrum when I was little and continued with Borland Pascal, Borland C++ and Visual Fox Pro in high-school and fell in love with coding.

Now I LOVE javascript and actionscript3. I know my way around php, sql, html, css and I've had to deal a little bit with java. I think I can still do design in photoshop and I've crossed paths with adobe after effects plenty of times.

I've developed a huge number of websites, single and multiplayer games, desktop and small mobile applications. I'm addicted to my Macbook Pro, Flash Builder and Coda2 IDEs.

I love object oriented thinking in programming, reusing code and I have an absolute obsession with code indentation, dynamic and scalable entities.

I'm always experimenting and trying to learn new things, my latest craze is backbonejs and the stage3d based starling framework and box2d intrigues me more than it should.

I'd love to have the available free time to learn java and haxe and my hobby/dream is to become a game developer.

items.name: romanian
items.description: putem purta o discutie despre orice, cel mai mult imi face placere sa discut despre jocuri

items.name: english
items.description: I've learned english from watching cartoons all day and bugging my mom about what <this> and <that> means

items.name: spanish
items.description: hace mucho tiempo desde que he hablado español, pero con un poquito de cerveza creo que puedo recordar todo lo que he olvidado

education.name: Nichita Stanescu High School
education.degreepaper: my degree submission was composed of three very complex applications
education.extras: main app was a fictional perfume store in FoxPro, next a HTML website about Dragon Ball Z and finally a Flash5 presentation about Ruff Ryders

education.name: The Bucharest University of Economic Studies
education.degreepaper: genetic algorithms, optimization and minimization of waste & resources
education.extras: my degree app was a simulation of waste minimization made with macromedia flash 7
